title: [P1] Sprint 16 dogfood readiness plan
description: Create a sprint plan for using ion to work on ion: TUI stability, agent usability, and lean automated checks without test-driven overengineering.

logs.msg: Creating Sprint 16 dogfood readiness plan focused on TUI stability + agent usability with lean automation only.

Performed sprint-plan review pass: checked dependency chain completeness, task atomicity, acceptance criteria specificity, and demoability across Sprint 16-18. Adjusted scope to lean testing (L0/L1 only) and explicit non-goal for heavy TUI test harness.
